author: Jason Morgan
title: Why I’m Nominating a Hong Kong Freedom Fighter for the Nobel
description: As the China-originated coronavirus reminds us, truth and democracy must always prevail over lies and authoritarianism. The post Why I’m Nominating a Hong Kong Freedom Fighter for the Nobel appeared first on The American Conservative.
content:
As the China-originated coronavirus reminds us, truth and democracy must always prevail over lies and authoritarianism.In February of this year, I nominated Andy Chan for the Nobel Peace Prize.
It wasnt my idea. Ishii Hidetoshi, the vice president of the Fre… [+8708 chars]
